results.question: Why might you throw an error?
results.correct_Answer: The code has become too complicated to continue writing
incorrect_answers: The code has become too easy
Something unexpected happened and the normal flow of execution can't continue
To pass data to a caller method

results.question: How can you deal with an error?
results.correct_Answer: By informing the user of the failure
